data.title: Incredible Room
data.text: This room (Magician's Study) is absolutely amazing. The theming is top notch, the puzzles are all super well designed and extremely organic in the environment, and the magic (tech) is incredibly impressive. This is the top of my list after doing more than 20 Escape Rooms. Can't wait to come back and try the new one that's under construction!

data.title: A magical experience!
data.text:
I've done 50+ Escape Rooms across the US and Europe and can say that Boxaroo's Mystery of the Magician's Study is the best escape room in Boston.

The escape room is actually a high-tech contraption, but all of the tech is hidden so a lot of the sequences that trigger when you do something special feel like "magic". There's a ton of fun surprises (both large and little) in this room and this is a blast to do with friends. There's not as much of an emphasis on paper puzzles - the puzzles in this room are part of the decor and furniture, and work well with the overall theme.

data.title: Great puzzles and atmosphere
data.text:
We loved this escape game! Production values were high. The puzzles were hard but fun and made sense with the theme (mystery of the magician's study). I've played many escape games and this one is better than 75% of them.

There was a good amount technology and gadgets but they weren't too gimmicky or intrusive. Everything worked just like magic!

The hint system was nice. There's no screen or intrusion to break the mood like in other games.

Our gamemaster was kind enough to give us extra time as we were a team of only two people. There are several puzzles that can be worked on in parallel so I'd say 4 players would be ideal.
